.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.4.0 (2019-10-28)
++++++++++++++++++

* Added support for Django 2.2
* Added Redis Status check


0.3.0 (2018-10-21)
++++++++++++++++++

* Added support for Django 2.1
* Warnings do not affect SERVICE_OPERATIONAL


0.2.0 (2017-04-12)
++++++++++++++++++

* Added Celery check


0.1.0 (2017-04-10)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
